DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effect 35 EECP session cardiopulmonary training performance healthy volunteer . Data study use generate sample size power calculation feasibility future EECP study . The result study could provide evidence help active duty Department Defense beneficiary optimize physical conditioning , endurance overall health .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Enhanced External Counterpulsation ( EECP ) VO2 MAX
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study assess effect 35 EECP session cardiopulmonary training performance healthy volunteer . Prior publish anecdotal evidence suggest EECP improve athletic performance . Data study use generate sample size power calculation feasibility future EECP study . The result study could provide evidence help active duty Department Defense beneficiary optimize physical conditioning , endurance overall health . It could help active duty member maximize physical training potential enable good prepare mission range . Additionally , physiologic cardiopulmonary improvement may potential decrease conditioning time require injured , post-operative post-partum active duty member return duty .
DOC.criteria: Healthy activeduty military personnel DoD beneficiary Medically clear 1.5 mile run test [ subject medically clear via PI 's discretion physician consultation letter ] 18 year old [ age cutoff need , subject medically clear via PI 's discretion physician consultation letter ] Scoring 55 60 point 1.5 mile run portion test use current AFI fitness standard [ adjust age gender ] Maintaining steady workout routine agree adhere duration study . The workout vary great 50 % week week ( e.g . subject work 3 hour week 1 , work 1.5 4.5 hour week 2 ) . Dermatological condition impact EECP procedure allow enroll ( e.g . eczema ) . Pregnancy anticipate pregnancy Exemption PT ( run portion physical fitness test ) VO2MAX great 55 mL/kg/min [ determine baseline CPX ] Scheduled permanent change station within 3 month Any significant comorbid health condition medically classify subject healthy [ PI 's discretion ] , include limited following . Previous myocardial infarction , hernia , aneurysms , retinal detachment ( unless fix laser surgery ) , macular edema , chest pain , ocular bleeding seizure Risk pulmonary edema Diagnosed diabetes , heart failure , atrial fibrillation epilepsy Coagulopathy INR prothrombin time > 2.5 Valvular heart disease Blood pressure > 140/100 mmHg < 90/60 mmHg upon clinic visit Subjects heart rate > 120 bpm upon clinic visit Subjects implantable cardioverterdefibrillator pacemaker History deep vein thrombosis History pulmonary embolism Family history individual multiple pulmonary embolism young onset pulmonary embolism ( < 65 year old ) Bleeding diathesis Presence abdominal surgery within past 6 month EMR
